text: Joap mɨkemegha gɨvazɨma, Devit dɨkavigha ghua nguibar ekiamɨn tiar akamɨn aperaghav iti. Ezɨ an mɨdorozir gumaziba kamaghɨn oraki, atrivim nguibar ekiamɨn tiar akamɨn boroghɨn aperaghav iti. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, an mɨdorozir gumaziba iza a ko iti. Ezɨ Israelian mɨdorozir gumaziba arava vaghvagha bar uan nguibabar ghue.
